title: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description:
Build 2002071610021.

Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
OB:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the Coolbar.
3. Press the Delete button.
4. Confirm that the first item on the second row is deleted.
5. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row.
EB:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the Coolbar.
3. Press the Delete button.
4. Confirm that the first item on the second row is deleted.
5. Notice that the second row is removed.
SR: The Launch item should remain on the second row after deleting the first item on the second row in the Coolbar.
